Snapshot

About Us

Arab Center for Consultancy and Economic Studies was established in Abu Dhabi in 2006 to provide various advisory services, especially in the domain of feasibility studies, which support large, small, and medium-sized enterprises as well as entrepreneurs from different backgrounds. We have a dedicated team handling deep market research across multiple management consultancy verticals.
About Us

Our geographic Coverage

The range of our services Within the state: Abu Dhabi, Dubai, Sharjah, Ras Al Khaimah, Ajman, Fujairah, Um al-Quwain.

Outside the country: GCC Countries

Other Arab countries and the rest of the world: Covered in cooperation with international expert houses
Arab Center

Our Services

• Feasibility studies
• Market Research and marketing plans
• industrial and commercial Land allocation
• Factories feasibility study
• Hydroponics Farm feasibility studies
• AquaCulture Farm feasibility studies
• Universities, schools, Hospitals, Clinics, and medical centers feasibility studies.
• Management consultancy reports
• Evaluation of existing and new projects
• Restructuring of insolvent companies
• Business setup
• Investment opportunities
• Develop risk management strategies.
• Evaluation of existing companies in different ways.
• Conducting various tests of non-ignorance Due Diligence.
• Manage negotiations to get the best price for sale or purchase.
• Develop the operational and financial plan of the company after purchase to increase its value.
• Franchise business plans
• Strategic business plans
• Financial models / financial plans
• Business valuation
• organizational restructuring
• Environmental studies
• Special purposes feasibility studies like Studies for funding (Dubai SME, Khalifa Fund)
About Us

Our Vision & Mission

“To be a recognized leader in providing consultancy services with high professionalism, creativity and world standards of quality.”

To support our customers with highly quality advisory and consulting services in the UAE and the Arab world.
